title: challaga naathO
sahitya:
callaga nAtO balkumI rAma sArasa vadana sAdhu santrANa



anupallavi



ullamunanu nIkE marulukonnAnu uragashayana nA tappu lencaka

nIvu



caraNam



nirupama shUra nikhilAdhAra para kAminI dUra pApa vidhAra

     sarasija nEtra shyAmala gAtra vara tyAgarAraja hrdvArija

mitra
